The mephit exhales a 15- foot cone of blinding dust. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 10
Dexterity saving throw or be blinded for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself
on a success.
Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of dust. Each creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a DC 10
Constitution saving throw or be blinded for 1 minute. A blinded creature can repeat the saving throw on each of its turns, ending the effect on itself
on a success.
features.sleep:
, requiring no material components. Its
innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.
